title: Blood Moon skins
body: How come we don't have a skin for the obvious champs? I'm talking about {{champion:131}} who is all about the moon and {{champion:8}} who is all about that blood. Wouldn't it make sense for these two to get Blood Moon skins?

replies.body:
Obvious is too Obvious

and at the time when the skins would make sense for a release, the champions aren't popular enough to get that attention.
Then again Zilean got a skin and I find he's less popular than the two but that's just my analysis.

Na, at the time when he got that skin, i think he was meta in mid-lane. 

Either way i think he was a pocket pick or so for bjerg around that timespan
Probably because they are a little too obvious.
